Thank you for your comments and i have to say that i real prefered to upload this game with him running fine , in fact it is the first time that i am uploading like this , the true is that was more than a couple of weeks without new nice  pc games and a few users from my blog talked to me about this game many times before , i was close deciding once more : no , i donÂ´t upload without the game be ok to play but for other side still many users that donÂ´t mind to download pratical files getting the game like it is now for 6.1 gb , then i tought to myself : it is close a week now that the game iso is available and i have the main work done for the pratical file , the true is that i normaly want the game running to test everything , on this one a strange incident happen giving me the possibility to work and test anyway under the circunstances : i am talking about the fact that it is possible to reach the game menu inside the game but not really playing without bypassing the drm online but the tests was ok anyway , so i decide to upload and give to god the opportunity to the users play thsi game soon as possible .

Yes , my friendly users , we are passing a kind of strange time about playing new nice pc games getted on the torrent files , the future is uncertain but our good wish to keep going still alive , believing more as possible that this type of situations can change .

Thank you and i really hope that every single downloader of this file get the opportunity to play this game soon as possible .
